post_text: July 17, 2014 at 10:55â€¯PM#1Random request, but I'm looking for a pop up window displaying information (custom written info) to pop up either when the console starts, or if that isn't an option, when a Macro is hit.We have occasional volunteers running the board, so when they start it I'd like them to see a quick checklist of things to do.
title: Dialogue Box Message On Start/Macro
